column4: Hey all I have an external monitor connected to my laptop which is to the left of my laptop screen. Is there a way to have the desktop and panels on the right hand monitor (my laptop LCD)?
Just drag and drop the panels.
Hm, idk the exact model. It's Intel though. 4500HD I thiiink.
my desktop icons go to the external monitor as well. Just do a big drag and drop of everything?
